common.need_help: Need help? Reply to this email or contact us at

welcome.subject: Welcome to BookPrinta - Complete Your Account
welcome.heading: Welcome to BookPrinta!
welcome.body: Your payment has been confirmed and your account is ready to be set up. Click the button below to set your password and complete your registration.
welcome.expires: This link expires in 24 hours. If it expires, you can request a new one from the login page.

signup_link.subject: Your BookPrinta Signup Link
signup_link.heading: Complete Your Account
signup_link.body: Use the link below to finish setting up your BookPrinta account. You'll need to set a password and verify your email.
signup_link.requested: You or someone requested a new signup link for your BookPrinta account.

book_status.subject: Book Update: {bookTitle}
book_status.heading: Your Book Status Has Changed
book_status.body: Your book "{bookTitle}" has been updated to a new status.

quote_received.subject: We Received Your Custom Quote Request
quote_received.heading: Quote Request Received
quote_received.body: Thank you for submitting your custom quote request. Here's a summary of what you submitted. Our team will review your requirements and get back to you with a detailed proposal.
quote_received.step_2: We prepare a detailed proposal with pricing
quote_received.step_3: You'll receive the proposal via email within 2-3 business days

quote_admin.subject: New Custom Quote Request - {reference}
quote_admin.heading: New Custom Quote Request
quote_admin.body: A new custom quote request has been submitted and requires your review.

quote_proposal.subject: Your BookPrinta Custom Quote is Ready
quote_proposal.heading: Your Custom Quote
quote_proposal.body: Great news! We've prepared a custom quote based on your requirements. Please review the proposal and proceed with payment when you're ready.
quote_proposal.valid_until: This quote is valid for 14 days.

password_reset.subject: Reset Your BookPrinta Password
password_reset.heading: Password Reset Request
password_reset.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
password_reset.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

refund_confirm.subject: Refund Processed - Order #{orderNumber}
refund_confirm.heading: Your Refund Has Been Processed
refund_confirm.body: We've processed a refund for your order. The details are below.
refund_confirm.processing_time: Please allow 5-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account.

manuscript_rejected.subject: Manuscript Review Update - {bookTitle}
manuscript_rejected.heading: Manuscript Requires Attention
manuscript_rejected.body: After reviewing your manuscript for "{bookTitle}", our team has identified some issues that need to be addressed before we can proceed.
manuscript_rejected.support: If you have questions about this feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out.

bank_transfer_user.subject: Payment Being Verified - Order #{orderNumber}
bank_transfer_user.heading: We Received Your Payment
bank_transfer_user.body: Thank you for your bank transfer. Our team is currently verifying your payment. This typically takes less than 30 minutes during business hours.
bank_transfer_user.step_1: Our team verifies your transfer receipt
bank_transfer_user.step_2: Once verified, you'll receive your account signup link via email
bank_transfer_user.step_3: Complete your account setup and start your publishing journey

bank_transfer_admin.subject: New Bank Transfer - Order #{orderNumber}
bank_transfer_admin.heading: New Bank Transfer Received
bank_transfer_admin.body: A new bank transfer has been submitted and requires your review.
bank_transfer_admin.sla_reminder: Please review within 30 minutes to maintain our SLA.

reprint_confirm.subject: Reprint Order Confirmed - #{orderNumber}
reprint_confirm.heading: Reprint Order Confirmed
reprint_confirm.body: Your reprint order has been confirmed and is being prepared for production.

production_delay.subject: Production Update - Longer Wait Times Expected
production_delay.heading: Production Update
production_delay.body: We're experiencing high demand and printing may take longer than the usual 72 hours. We're working hard to get your book to you as soon as possible.
production_delay.patience: We sincerely appreciate your patience and understanding.

review_request.subject: Your Book is Printed! Share Your Experience
review_request.heading: Your Book is Ready!
review_request.body: Great news! "{bookTitle}" has been printed and is on its way to you. We'd love to hear about your experience with BookPrinta.
review_request.why: Your feedback helps us improve and helps other authors make informed decisions.

profile_complete.subject: Complete Your Author Profile on BookPrinta
profile_complete.heading: Readers Want to Find You
profile_complete.body: Your book is getting noticed! Complete your author profile so readers can find and contact you from our showcase page. Add your bio, a profile photo, and links to where readers can buy your books.
profile_complete.benefit_1: Get discovered by readers on our showcase page
profile_complete.benefit_2: Direct readers to where they can buy your books
profile_complete.benefit_3: Build your author brand and credibility

contact_admin.subject: New Contact Form Submission
contact_admin.heading: New Contact Message
contact_admin.body: A new message has been submitted through the contact form and requires your attention.

contact_confirm.subject: We Received Your Message â€” BookPrinta
contact_confirm.heading: Message Received!
contact_confirm.body: Thank you for reaching out to us. We've received your message and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
contact_confirm.step_2: We prepare a response tailored to your inquiry
contact_confirm.step_3: You'll hear back from us within 24 hours
